DOC.brief_summary: To compare vascular enhancement two contrast agent pulmonary Multi-detector CTA
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 yr old With suspect PE Referred MDCTA pulmonary artery Signed informed consent Pregnant lactating female History hypersensitivity iodinate contrast agent Hyperthyroidism pheochromocytoma Severe CHF Renal impairment Weight great 300 lbs Pacemaker Swan Ganz catheter Defibrillator intrathoracic metallic vascular device Received investigational compound within 30 day study
